title: What are the basic tools needed for farming? - Quora

response.answer_text: Actually there is quite a bit. Really it all depends on what you are growing/raising and how big. I’ll answer this question with everything that my family uses on our farm. In an effort to keep this short and simple I won’t be specific with sizes or equipment or horsepower required. TractorPlanterSprayerCombineCorn Head (What goes in front of the combine to harvest corn)Bean Head (What goes in front of the combine to harvest soybeans)Auger CartStrip-till unit (Our operation is no-till/strip-till. If you farm using conventional tillage you’d also need a cultivator and v-ripper.)Semi with trailerThat is what I would call the absolute minimum for a row crop operation in Iowa. Our operation has more than what I listed but if someone had a smaller version of our operation they could get by with that. It all really depends what you are farming, how much and where.

Plow or Plough harrow Seeder If you want to grow plants in winter, you can consider creating a greenhouse and buy some LED grow lights to add lights and keep warm If you are interested, here is the link you can see how it works: MEIZHI 600W LED Grow Light Indoor Hydropolic Full Spectrum VEG BLOOM Indoor Grow | eBay
